name: DigiBoxx
description: Made-in-India secure cloud storage for individuals and enterprises with data sovereignty

opengraph.description: Digiboxx: India's free cloud storage & file sharing app. Securely store, share, & access your files anytime, anywhere. Sign up today and get 20 GB free storage!
opengraph.twitter_title: DigiBoxx - Indian File Sharing App & Online File Transfer Platform
